title: Turnips with honey and zaatar
intro: France's recipe: great as a side, can be eaten hot or cold.

insSteps: Boil or steam the turnip until it is cooked through.
Roughly peel the turnip and slice it.
Add a tablespoon of olive oil in a pan and add the turnip slices. Fry them until they are golden on both sides.
Place the slices on a big plate, drizzle with honey, top with the salt and a generous amount of zaatar.
